Greetings all, I am looking into the shinto smith Masanori ( yamato no daij=
o fujiwara masanori ). In Fujishiro's, they place the Shodai in Genna ( 161=
5 ) and the Nidai in Kanban ( 1661 ) They also have a yamato no daijo masan=
ori listed in Kan'ei ( 1624 ) who may or may not be the Nidia. There would =
seem to be quite a bit of difference in time between 1624 and 1661, I mean =
buy that, he would have either been pretty young if he was in fact the smit=
h working in 1623 or pretty old when listed as the Nidai. 

I then also hav=
e volume 47 of Token Shibata which has an excellent example of the Shodai's=
 work in it and it places it at Keich=F4 ( 1596 )

Does anyone have any cla=
rification on when the Shodai and Nidai worked ?, and does Fujishiro's date=
 them according to title. i.e. the Nidai received the Daijo title in 1661 s=
o that is the date Fujishiro listed him from.

cheers all

Rich T
